definitions.definition: A (generally human) male who begets a child.
definitions.example: My father was a strong influence on me.

definitions.definition: A male ancestor more remote than a parent; a progenitor; especially, a first ancestor.
A term of respectful address for an elderly man.
definitions.example: Come, father; you can sit here.

definitions.definition: A term of respectful address for a priest.
A person who plays the role of a father in some way.
definitions.example: My brother was a father to me after my parents got divorced.

definitions.definition: The founder of a discipline or science.
definitions.example: Albert Einstein is the father of modern physics.

definitions.definition: Something that is the greatest or most significant of its kind.
To be a father to; to sire.
To act as a father; to support and nurture.
